name: three-new-shader-material
description: * Build with [webpack 4](https://webpack.js.org/) and [babel 7](https://babeljs.io/) * Test with [jest](https://jestjs.io) * Lint with [eslint](http://eslint.org/) (Using ["Standard JS" config](https://github.com/standard/eslint-config-standard) as default) * Hot reloading with [webpack-dev-server](https://webpack.js.org/configuration/dev-server/)

scripts.npm:patch: npm run prod && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.npm:minor: npm run prod && npm version minor && npm publish

author: Faraz Shaikh
